javadoc: MemoryBlockDiff determines the types of differences between two memory blocks.

methods.name: <init>
methods.comment:
Constructor. MemoryBlockDiff determines the types of differences 
 between two memory blocks.

methods.javadoc: Returns true if the memory block names differ.
methods.name: isNameDifferent
methods.comment: Returns true if the memory block names differ.

methods.javadoc: Returns true if the start addresses of the memory blocks differ.
methods.name: isStartAddressDifferent
methods.comment: Returns true if the start addresses of the memory blocks differ.

methods.javadoc: Returns true if the end addresses of the memory blocks differ.
methods.name: isEndAddressDifferent
methods.comment: Returns true if the end addresses of the memory blocks differ.

methods.javadoc: Returns true if the sizes of the memory blocks differ.
methods.name: isSizeDifferent
methods.comment: Returns true if the sizes of the memory blocks differ.

methods.javadoc: Returns true if the memory blocks Read flags differ.
methods.name: isReadDifferent
methods.comment: Returns true if the memory blocks Read flags differ.

methods.javadoc: Returns true if the memory blocks Write flags differ.
methods.name: isWriteDifferent
methods.comment: Returns true if the memory blocks Write flags differ.

methods.javadoc: Returns true if the memory blocks Execute flags differ.
methods.name: isExecDifferent
methods.comment: Returns true if the memory blocks Execute flags differ.

methods.javadoc: Returns true if the memory blocks Volatile flags differ.
methods.name: isVolatileDifferent
methods.comment: Returns true if the memory blocks Volatile flags differ.

methods.javadoc: Returns true if the type for the memory blocks differ.
methods.name: isTypeDifferent
methods.comment: Returns true if the type for the memory blocks differ.

methods.javadoc: Returns true if the initialization of the memory blocks isn't the same.
methods.name: isInitDifferent
methods.comment: Returns true if the initialization of the memory blocks isn't the same.

methods.javadoc: Returns true if the source for the memory blocks differ.
methods.name: isSourceDifferent
methods.comment: Returns true if the source for the memory blocks differ.

methods.javadoc: Returns true if the comments on the memory blocks differ.
methods.name: isCommentDifferent
methods.comment: Returns true if the comments on the memory blocks differ.

methods.javadoc: Gets a string representation of the types of memory differences for this MemoryBlockDiff.
methods.name: getDifferencesAsString
methods.comment: Gets a string representation of the types of memory differences for this MemoryBlockDiff.

methods.name: getDiffFlags
methods.comment:
Gets an integer value that has bits set as flags indicating the types of differences
 that exist between the two memory blocks.

name: MemoryBlockDiff
comment: MemoryBlockDiff determines the types of differences between two memory blocks.
